CustomField.description: Used for compensation purposes to calculate k12 amount of new sales on renewal quotes and from other channels
CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c)) && ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Renewal'), ((SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Comp_New_Sales_Renewal_Subscription__c/SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c)*12+ SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Comp_New_Sales_Renewal_One_Time__c),
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c)) && (ISPICKVAL(Type, 'New_Business') || ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Upsale')|| ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Cross_sale')) , ((SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Comp_New_Sales_Subscription__c/SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c)*12+ SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Comp_New_Sales_One_Time__c),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName= 'Sales_other_channels',(Comp_Internet__c*1.0)+(Comp_M2M__c*0.8)+(Comp_MBB__c*1.0)+ (Comp_MPLS__c*1.0)+(Comp_Non_TENCE__c*1.2)+(Comp_SIP_Fastnet__c*1.2)+(Comp_TENCE__c*1.2)+(Comp_UC__c*1.2)+(Comp_Voice__c*1.0)+(Comp_DaaS__c*1.2)+(Comp_Call_Guide__c*1.2)+(Comp_Dual_SIM__c*1.0)+( Comp_Fastnettelefoni__c*0.8),0)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for compensation to calculate k12 of new sales on renewal quotes, new sales from other channels + k12 on New Business, Cross-sale, Upsale Opportunities (incl product gearing) - this amount can be changed by Activation if Quantity changes
CustomField.label: Comp K12 Amount New Sales
